position: Cynical realist who sees most people as conformist, but holds hope for individuals.

the_case: Let me make the case for cynical realist who sees most people as conformist, but holds hope for individuals.. You think most people are dumb and follow the crowd. You're critical of American culture, Boomers, and social media trends. But you also recognize there are good people worth knowing—you just have to find them.
